txt.en: 'I will regret nothing.'
'Your petition is heard. As I have said, I will look into it. You are dismissed. Now go.'
'I give you my thanks again [placeholder] for witnessing the petition. Let us leave these chambers and return to Dâr Laja.'
Instance: An Audience with the Storm
Approach Zarzíra Dawn-star to begin her petition.
Talk to Rothog
'Most exalted Rothog, I come to you to tell of you a most dire situation.'
Zarzíra Dawn-star waits for her petition to be heard in Rothog's Chambers
'As you know, one of your gladiators, Shaidal, has flung a series of unfounded accusations against me.'
Rothog requests that you call forth the petitioner
'Last evening, my residence was broken into by an unknown assailant, and some items were taken.'
'The items that were stolen are of great import to me.'
Members of the Kindred of the Coins take petitions from nobles throughout Umbar. Rothog has summoned you to his chambers to hear one specific complaint.
'It is my solemn belief that Shaidal is behind this assault on my home.'
'With all the force of my house, I demand that Shaidal be turned over to me immediately to face judgement.'
'Rothog, you will regret-'
Speak to Rothog regarding Zarzíra Dawn-star's petition
'I am not sure why I must address this petition with the likes of you, but if I must, I will begin.'

'These accusations are most troubling. While I do not doubt that these incidents have transpired, I do feel that she may not be telling us everything. It would be good to investigate this further.\n\n'Would you be willing to do so?'
Speak to Zarzíra and witness the proceedings
Speak to Rothog the Storm
Rothog has summoned you to his chambers to hear a specific complaint from one of his nobles regarding one of the gladiators.
'Demand?'
'Let us see what she is to say regarding this situation. It should be most interesting.\n\n'Tell her she may begin.'
'You overstep your place here.'
'Making such a demand does intrigue me about the situation.'
'I will find those responsible and deal with them in good time.'
